dialog_1.name: Mum
dialog_1.text: Have you heard about all the recent violence?! The world is turning upside down!

dialog_2.name: Mum
dialog_2.text: I heard a gang is going around beating people up! You should be more careful!

dialog_3.name: Mum
dialog_3.text: I think you should go find Uncle Lee to learn some self defence.
